title: "Truly Embrace the Halfling Within" - with Caldwell Tanner
itunes:title: "Truly Embrace the Halfling Within" - with Caldwell Tanner
description:
Join two black hedgehogs and one white hedg- I mean Halfling as we talk embracing the chaos in your games and turning it into a knight made of Jam, allowing an audience to dream into your work and acknowledging your unconscious bias.

Find Caldwell online:

Twitter

NADDPOD

Caldwell's Friend of a Took, Kiana Mai:

@kianamaiart


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

Theme Music by Jonathan Charles

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
